Content: Alert to a sudden outbreak of a fire in the general boggy area from Muthurajawela to Pubudugama during morning hours on Monday (10), 5 Officers and 30 Other Ranks of 1 Sri Lanka Armoured Corps and 8 Sri Lanka Light Infantry of the 141 Brigade, together with the 141 Brigade Commander rushed to the area and brought the fast spreading bush fires under control. Local residents and the Police have sought the assistance of the Army for this operation.
